content: "Come", disse Al-Sayib. "Pensi che andare su una televisione internazionale significhi aver bisogno di pavoneggiarsi con un Armani adesso?"
translations: eng:What﹖ asked Al-Sayib. You think that being on international TV means that you need to strut around in an Armani now﹖
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by bruno_b (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
